text: Bryant Robert Burns (born 24 March 1929) is an Australian politician. He is a member of the Labor Party. He served as a Senator for Queensland from 1987 until his retirement in 1996. Burns was born in Rockhampton, Queensland. He married Lorraine in 1953. The couple had seven children. After his first wife's death, he married his second wife, Annette. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Australian Labor Party politicians Category:Members of the Australian Senate Category:Politicians from Queensland
title: Bryant Burns
